text.name: options.title
text.value: The majority of your PPC ad budget may be going to waste

text.name: options.description
text.value: The sad truth is that most PPC campaigns severely underperform. Meaning that you’re probably already paying too much for your leads and sales. But in an industry where everyone is an overnight ‘expert’, it’s hard to know who you can trust to improve your ROI.

text.name: options.question
text.value: “So what are my options?”

text.name: options.option1.label
text.value: option 01

text.name: options.option1.title
text.value: Managing your PPC account yourself

text.name: options.option1.intro
text.value: When spending so much on ads, it’s tempting to try and manage your account internally. At least you can trust your own intentions, right? But this strategy often backfires.

text.name: options.option1.pro1.text
text.value: - You can save some money upfront. And you can trust your own intentions.

text.name: options.option1.con1.title
text.value: Experience is essential

text.name: options.option1.con1.text
text.value: - PPC management is complex and intricate, and ad platforms are incentivized to make you spend more and more.

text.name: options.option1.con2.title
text.value: Time intensive

text.name: options.option1.con2.text
text.value: - your time is valuable - is it better spent on becoming a PPC expert or on what you do best - running your business?

text.name: options.option2.label
text.value: option 02

text.name: options.option2.title
text.value: Hiring a digital marketing agency

text.name: options.option2.intro
text.value: Full-service marketing agencies will try to convince you to let them take care of your PPC campaigns too. But can generalists really make a tangible difference?

text.name: options.option2.pro1.title
text.value: Low effort

text.name: options.option2.pro1.text
text.value: - No need to search for the ideal solution, a full-service agency just handles everything.

text.name: options.option2.con1.title
text.value: Marketing vs data

text.name: options.option2.con1.text
text.value: - Most agencies are focused much more on marketing than on a data-driven, ROI maximizing approach.

text.name: options.option2.con2.title
text.value: Lack of expertise

text.name: options.option2.con2.text
text.value: - Getting the best value for your ad spend often requires uncommon insider knowledge that only experienced specialists have.

text.name: options.option3.label
text.value: option 03

text.name: options.option3.title
text.value: Hiring an in-house PPC manager

text.name: options.option3.intro
text.value: You can always keep tabs on an in-house PPC manager - maybe that’s a better bet?

text.name: options.option3.pro1.text
text.value: - As your employee, you can usually trust that they have your best interests at heart.

text.name: options.option3.con1.title
text.value: Expensive option

text.name: options.option3.con1.text
text.value: - A recurring salary, in-house overheads, a high termination costs and the need for active management means this is a very costly option for most.

text.name: options.option3.con2.title
text.value: A risky gamble

text.name: options.option3.con2.text
text.value: - If your PPC manager is underperforming, not only will they be costing you in lost revenue but you may never even know.

text.name: services.kicker
text.value: But there's another option

text.name: services.description
text.value: At Coconut Digital, we’re not here to help you with your PR, your email marketing or your SEO. We specialize in one thing only - squeezing every last drop of value from your ad budget.

text.name: boosts.title
text.value: How Photon boosts ROI on your ad spend

text.name: boosts.subtitle
text.value: At Photon, we help you squeeze every last drop of value from your ad budget.

text.name: boosts.item1.title
text.value: Focused Expertise

text.name: boosts.item1.text
text.value: We’re not generalists that offer every marketing service under the sun. This means we can focus exclusively on making your PPC ads get better business outcomes.

text.name: boosts.item2.title
text.value: Extensive Experience

text.name: boosts.item2.text
text.value: Our highly specialized team has a combined 30+ years of experience in running PPC campaigns. This means your account is always managed by a senior expert.

text.name: boosts.item3.title
text.value: Insider Knowledge

text.name: boosts.item3.text
text.value: We’ve developed a proprietary approach to getting the best result for the lowest budget. This includes our custom-built software and our innovative strategies for optimal performance.

text.name: boosts.item4.title
text.value: Data Driven Approach

text.name: boosts.item4.text
text.value: A detailed understanding of the underlying numbers means the difference between metrics that just look good and ones that deliver tangible results

text.name: boosts.item5.title
text.value: Your Trusted Adviser

text.name: boosts.item5.text
text.value: We know that our success is based on the success of our clients. So we are always on the lookout for lucrative opportunities and new tactics to help our clients grow.

text.name: boosts.item6.title
text.value: Proactive Account Management

text.name: boosts.item6.text
text.value: We constantly strive to refine and optimize every account. As opposed to the ‘set it and forget it’ strategy that many agencies take.
